website_summaries.verdict: Powered from a car cigarette lighter, or wired into rear lights, this license plate mounted camera and monitor kit is suitable for cars and smaller trucks.
pros: Mount the camera above license plate for rearview monitoring
Can be set to run full time or just while reversing
Hooks up to a single supply and is easy to install
cons: Not suitable for large trucks or SUVs due to shorter cable

customer_reviews.title: Installed and Using!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in our 2010 KIA Sorento. The wiring was pretty easy to hide in the trim once I discovered how to remove the rear hatch trim. The only place the wire is visible is about 8 or so inches from the steering column to the LCD display. The only improvement I would suggest would be for the wiring diagrams to be printed a little larger, but then I am 84 years old. I did test the unit for operation before attempting to install. It is working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy To Install. I spliced the power cables from both the Camera and the Monitor cables into one connection using the cigarette lighter socket adapter that is included in the package. Quickest & Easiest way to install. Everything works amazing for the value. The night vision light works surprisingly well.
customer_reviews.author: True-Trades

customer_reviews.title: Really neat reverse camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera quality can be improved but in all honesty it works like how it says it should. It just didn't come with power to connect it to my cigarette but wired it to the reverse. It was just a better option in general.
customer_reviews.author: Odisho Sayyadi

customer_reviews.title: This camera is not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product it's a waste of time they say it's waterproof but it is not I had it on my truck for 2 weeks the first Heavy Rain the unit went through that was it the camera is all full of water now and now it's useless
customer_reviews.author: Jose O.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, amazing seller.
customer_reviews.text: After being asked to post a review, I advised the seller I didn't like that there was no on/off switch. Seller said they would send me a free one with a switch. I also was asked to send a photo of it installed....which I did. I'm out $80 for an install. It works fine, but promises made for a good review, of an extra one for free......never materialized.
customer_reviews.author: rickc

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Installation went as expected. Cord is almost too short for trucks, but works with no slack to spare, again, to be expected. However, I didn't expect the camera to be off center by so far. I installed the camera right side up but the camera is still too high. The biggest problem is that the camera is off center. It mounts straight to the license plate, and my bumper is straight, however the camera points to the left significantly. I have multiple nuts behind one side of the camera to shim it to see straight, but the misalignment of the lens is still too large. Spend money on a higher quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Right for the price but lied about free device.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for the price. Easy to install. At night is better than 3 others that I’ve used. I’d buy again. UPDATE, product is as said however they promised a free unit then said only if I leave a review. Which I did. Now they won’t send me a free unit unless I give 5 stars rather than the 4 I left. So now I’m thinking one star.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Myers

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: Guess I got a lemon, it didn't work right out of the box, and yes I installed it correctly but the monitor just won't power on, even when hooked straight to the car battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Andrew Myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Does not include an adaptor for the charging port
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to plug any of the cords in. There is no charger that is supposed to go into the cigarette/u.s.b. port. There are virtually no instructions, and what is there is not in decipherable English. The screen has a stand that is supposed to stick somewhere in your car but it is barely sticky at all, think like a Lisa Frank sticker. I mean, it definitely comes with tons of cords, but that is the only thing I can think of that would cost any money. I am trying to return this and get a more quality item.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: After hearing horror stories about "wireless" back up camera having lots of connectivity and interference issues, I went with the "hard wired" (wiring from camera to monitor). First week was great very useful, increases your confidence backing up to close objects. Until it rained. It intermittently worked but a few days later, it finally stopped working. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: ginomari

customer_reviews.title: works for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: There are a few issues which most have addressed earlier. Install is a pain, the instructions give you a link to a website to watch videos, but the site is in kanji and I couldn't even find the videos that were supposed to help. Second, the screen is pretty low quality, hard to see anything clearly and washes out quickly when your backup lights are on. Third issue that I have is actually not a big deal, but the lights on the camera don't actually work. Not really a big deal since I can't see much since the brightness of my regular backup lights overpowers the camera anyway.
customer_reviews.author: jla01

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work - could never get it installed
customer_reviews.text: Got this hoping it would make backing up safer for our teen driver. Spent hours, followed the directions to a letter, and it just wouldn't work. Returned it. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: AlaskaMama

customer_reviews.title: The camera is totally insensitive to green so my driveway blends into my lawn
customer_reviews.text: Although the seller sent me two additional cameras, both only showed black and white images. I'm stuck with a lot of installation work and a screen image that is not clear or responsive to the controls of the screen. This was listed as an Amazon Choice item.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true, junk!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, I got everything hooked up to find out the cheap plastic coated connections going into both the camera and monitor are junk, had to twist the wire around to get it to come on and was still fuzzy and flickering in and out. Returned... wish I could give it 0 stars but amazon won’t let me lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think it works pretty great it’s pretty standard I think it came with a nice size monitor I thought it was wireless but that’s ok I’m working with having the cord run through the back seat to the trunk and the lines don’t adjust when parking they stay still I wonder if that’s because it’s not attached to my break lights I’m not sure... other then that I found it to be pretty decent and excellent picture quality. Oh and I had to get instructions on how to install off YouTube it came with a little brochure but it wasn’t great in the self explanatory area. Took us about maybe 2hrs to install
customer_reviews.author: Alita Mariee

customer_reviews.title: Died after about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this back up camera....... While it worked! Had the unit for about 6 months it randomly stoped working about 2 months in then randomly started working again. Then finally died after about 6 months. But when it did work it made backing and hooking up trailers a breeze. I'll be spending the money for a better unit soon.
customer_reviews.author: michael tolbert

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The backup camera and monitor are about as cheap as you would expect a $30.00 monitor and camera would be. The reason I am giving it a low review is because they promised that I could get a windshield mount sent to me by just contacting them. The costumer representatives that I made contact with states that I qualified for the windshield mount and a free camera. They never sent the windshield mount or the camera. The free camera would of been nice but I need the windshield mount that they promised. If all you need is a cheap backup camera and monitor it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera with After Market Support
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple but very effective back up camera. The screen is just the right size and the camera is easy to connect to your back up tail light. The camera can be pointed several degrees vertically to obtain a clear view of your hitch. There are various videos on YouTube that can address installation issues but the company is highly response to any questions you may have about installation and will email a wiring diagram upon request. There are many other options out there but why spend more money than you have to?
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last more than a year, when used everyday.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this camera. I have to back up to a trailer on a daily basis, so it gets used OFTEN. This is the second camera that has not lasted a year. It works beautifully, while it works. I was hoping the first one was a fluke, and the second one would last longer. It has not, and now I must buy a THIRD camera.
customer_reviews.author: JWoessner

customer_reviews.title: Working good so far
customer_reviews.text: The install is not for beginners, had to tear many interior panels off of my vehicle and use a multimeter to find the reverse light wire to splice into – took me most of the day to install. Working good so far! I was worried that the provided wire might not be long enough for my van, but it was JUST enough.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Would get 5 stars if instructions were better
customer_reviews.text: Instructions aren't that good, 3M take isn't the best. But product works as advertised, great for the price. If you don't have basic electrical knowledge you should probably get a pro to install the product. I use it on my truck to hook up my trailor, works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan C Miller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work so far
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for...I got this because it was cheap and had good reviews...I must've gotten a bad unit...the first problem was the fact that it was like looking thru a double mirror where left is right and right is left (like backing up your boat or trailer where you have to steer left to go right n stuff...you dig?) Yes, so it was like that at first...now the seen thing doesn't even come on (it has been raining so, it may have issues with agua...they're sending another unit but, unfortunately I'm outta pocket for installation on the 1st unit so, I guess I'm paying for being cheap....smh ..I'll update on the 2nd unit
customer_reviews.author: PepeGraves

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I've hooked up 1 of the 2 I bought. It works but the display looks better in dim or dark light. During a very bright day it can be hard to see well. The glare shield came loose, almost peeled off within 3 days but it was of little use anyway. Everything I needed to hook it up came with it but if you have a long car or truck you will need more wire. I have a 2008 civic and the wires that you hook to the backup lights had maybe 3 inches to spare. It took me maybe 1.5 hours to hook up but I took my time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Chevrolet Silverado pickup. I put off installing for a while because I thought it was going to be a chore. It was truly a very easy installation. It has a nice picture quality for the price(as good or better than my factory Ford Fusion). It arrived very quickly and was packed well. My only complaint, which has nothing to do with the camera, is the metal stick-on for magnetic mount melted off within minutes of installation leaving the monitor hanging. I’ll just have to glue it instead. Contact with the seller was prompt and positive. So far I give this a 5 star overall rating.
customer_reviews.author: L Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2009 Scion xD
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how fast this item arrived-less than 24 hours after I purchased it from Amazon! I’m pleasantly surprised with how well the item was packaged. I really like the size of the backup camera and the fact it can be mounted behind my license plate (won’t block out the state’s name on my license). I hooked it up to my 2009 Scion xD and so far, everything is working well. My husband is going to drill a hole in the hatch of my Scion to route the camera wire into my car. I opted for the continuous running method, so it is wired to my cigarette lighter. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with the quality of the camera! Fit perfect on the license plate. I liked that they gave the option to either hook directly into the reverse light or into a power outlet. I decided to hook up directly to the reverse light, and couldn't be happier. Great picture quality for what I need. I will say that the metal magnetic plates didn't stick to the back of the screen casing very well so what I did was use some of my own 3M tape which did the job. After that, zero problems. Excellent for the price, and really gives me a peace of mind knowing what's behind me while backing up my SUV. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING AND FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.text: THIS SELLER IS A SCAM. You need one more small, black connector/adapter than what is provided in the box. The additional connector/adapter should connect to the camera wire from one end, and the other side of it should be green with two holes, one for a (+) positive wire, the other for the (-) wire. Without this MISSING PIECE, the cigarette lighter power option that is listed doesn't work!! When I tried contacting iProBay (this seller) by email, they never got back to me!!! Waste of money. And it was too late for me to get a refund because the "Amazon return window" had closed, so I'm stuck with this defective product.
customer_reviews.author: S.I.

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as they would like you to believe
customer_reviews.text: Spent all day on trying to install the camera and after chasing the voltage down and getting the correct wires attached turned on the unit and it did not want to come on. found that the wiring diagram for the installation left much to be desired and it the process of troubling shooting the problems it set some errors codes in my car's computer. Had to do a power reset. Bottom line is the camera is still not installed.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would not call the installation process "easy" if one cares about how the installation looks and works when they've completed it. I spent most of a day working on installing it on my 2007 Honda Civic, but I had to do some work (i.e. drilling, grinding & filing) on the trunk lid for the camera to fit correctly and to point in a useful direction. Unfortunately, none of the mounting hardware that came with it was appropriate for my installation. The image quality is satisfactory day or night. I'm happy with how it all turned out. It's nice to be able to clearly see what's behind me when I'm backing up. It also helps when backing into tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product so far. Purchased this a couple of weeks ago and everything works as advertised. Once the cables are run the hook-up is simple. Simply place the vehicle in reverse and the video appears on the monitor (there is an option to have the video up all the time). Picture quality is more than what you would expect for a product at this price point. Camera adjustment is simple and can be done without any tools making it easy to adjust for different tasks. I have used this to back my truck up to my trailer and I was able to put the ball right under the hitch after a couple of test runs.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backup camera especially for the price. Since I wasn’t sure how good it would be I decided to get it for my Kawasaki Mule. Just needed it for hitching up trailers but it’s so good I’m thinking of getting one for my wife’s car. The camera license plate bracket is metal not plastic and the camera mount on it is very secure. It has two power options. Plug into a 12 volt outlet or hard wire to the backup light. Both are easy and the instructions cover them in sufficient detail. Monitor settings simple and extensive. All in all a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Myers

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 4 star but the price raised it to 5. I bought this mainly because it was $40 and was surprised at how well it works. Screen is a little small but has good resolution and sight lines were pretty much dead on.. Took about an hour to install. I haven't used it at night yet. Update after a few months use. The screen is now oversaturated with light which makes it almost impossible to see anything. I've tried adjusting for contrast, etc on the back but no dice. I'd pass on this one. I just hope I can find one and not have to run the wiring again
customer_reviews.author: Larry Francis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to install. At night the l.e.d. lights are super bright! Almost too bright, like a flood lights. Kinda blinds from seeing the car when your backing out. I will check and see if there's a setting for that. I am happy. Although at sometime, I am going to toss the little monitor away and install a bluetooth stereo and use that with the camera. The Price is Good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Truth

customer_reviews.title: Works great, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fairly straight forward to install. Plenty of wire, and mounting hardware. Only problem was using the magnetic holder, the metal tab that sticks to the back of screen will not stay stuck when its warm outside. FIX: wipe spot with alcohol then scratch same surface lightly to roughen surface. Then add CA (superglue) to both sides of a piece of 3M tape and stick to metal tab and then to monitor. Overall great camera and best of all you get a free gift purchase. Dual outlet for cigarette lighter or another camera.
customer_reviews.author: RKDad

customer_reviews.title: Just installed the camera and monitor. Very simple instal ...
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the camera and monitor. Very simple instal and with an adapter, no hard wireing. The only issue is that the camera covers the “state name” on the plate. The camera could be placed on the bottom of the plate. Putting the camera on the bottom of the plate would mean more exposed wire. So, depending on the setup, there are remedies, just have to get creative. Some states are more strict then others when it comes to covering the state name and number. With some extra planning before instal, lay it out and see how it will go together.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to install on Prius 2010
customer_reviews.text: Great back up camera for the money! Why 3 star? Because installation is A PAIN!!!!!wires are not long enough, wires from the camera to your back up bulb are super bulkyy due to the resistor connections, does not fit to any lights openings/Prius 2010/ you need to drill holes if you have a newer car! I almost returned due to the extremely difficult and time consuming installation good picture Very clear images but I’m very cautious about long term reliability. I do not recommend this camera due to hard installation! Next time I will spent more money but will avoid painful installation!
customer_reviews.author: Atanaska Georgieva

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Installed in about 30 minutes. Once you locate the reverse light wires, the provided splice kit is easy to get connected. Dash mount isn't quite as stout as I would prefer but seems to be holding up well so far. Instructions are easy to follow, and there's plenty of cable for a typical pickup installation. The one thing I would change is mounting the camera on the license plate bracket. I would rather have it higher on the vehicle so it's at a better angle to view the trailer hitch...the only reason I wanted a camera.
customer_reviews.author: way2easy

customer_reviews.title: Make your vehicle safer
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price and works great too. Easy to install even on a large pick-up truck. They even sent enough wire to do the extended pick-up trucks. I wanted the smaller screen as it does not block my view and the colors are crystal clear. Sure will be easier to back up to my boat trailer. It upgrades our truck to the new ones on the market and I recommend this to anyone without this feature and makes life much safer when backing up with the blind spot covered.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Camera, Seller Replies Fast - would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have connected the display to the backup camera to test it to see if it works. It did work perfectly. The one issue is that the RCA Video Cable was too short and I emailed the seller about it, they replied within a few hours and said that they would send me the length I need with the windshield mount. So far I am very impressed by it, can't wait for my extended video cable and mount to come in so I can properly install it to the car! Will edit this review once installation is done!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit but camera susceptible to water damage. *Read*
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can’t beat it. Comes with everything you’ll need and it’s all decent quality. However, after the first couple rainstorms the camera stopped working. Upon inspection I found it full of condensation. It’s been 6 months since I’ve installed and the camera only works on and off. Tried to stall it dying by adding some silicone at the seams but it’s too damaged. My best advice, take a small amount of flowable silicone to the camera lens/led lights (just around the edges and a SMALL amount) not to cover the camera. Throw some regular silicone where the camera pivots once you know where you want it angled and the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second back up camera I have installed in my 2007 Camry. The first one was a wireless camera, which was easy to install but the picture quality was poor. The LKL HD720P Back Up Camera and Monitor is wired. It was a bit of a challenge to install but the picture quality is much better than the wireless one. Granted, the back up cameras that are factory installed have a better picture quality but all-in-all this unit is very good for the price and I would recommend it to anyone who needs a backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Northeaster

customer_reviews.title: College Nerd Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a college kid and don't know much about cars, but I'm learning. The install was very straightforward and simple even for a beginner like me! Just search your specific car and see how to remove the panels so you could run the wiring without any of it showing. The only problem I had was the instructions, I wish the diagram was much larger and clearer! Overall GREAT product. Included wiretaps if you wanted to tap into your reverse lights instead of using the lighter plug. I went with the lighter plug install so I could turn the camera on or off even while on the road. So convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: gives alot of light
customer_reviews.text: works well. the light emitted from it at nights are a bit bight and too wide in range, as opposed to pointed. so it impairs vision slightly sometimes. it doesn't repel water so if a drop of water is on the lens you wont be able to see properly. otherwise for this price it a good buy. the display sticker came off from the monitor itself after a few weeks on my dash. that was disappointing. but i am still using it months later. with double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: How can anyone say its straighforward?
customer_reviews.text: Probably a good product if you're a mechanic or electronically savvy. For the average consumer this product is overwhelmingly complicated to install and the reviews I've seen dont do a good job explaining that at all. After trying for hours to find out how in the world I was going to route a wire from the back of my car to the front without drilling holes in it I packed the product up and returned it. Hopefully you know what you're doing or plan on hiring a professional before buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Descent camera/great value
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not the best car out there but it's a great value. Back up lines do not move and they are not well placed so make sure you get comfortable before actual use. Very easy install if you use the cigarette lighter push button feature. You'll have to push the button each time you want to use camera which is fine with me. You can also install it so it automatically kicks on when in reserve. Choice is yours. If your looking for a simple solution this is a value buy. Will buy another for my other vehicle
customer_reviews.author: MARSHALL LAW

customer_reviews.title: Seriously- BUY IT! You will NOT regret it!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this for my Teenage sons 2013 Nissan Altima. I personally have back up cameras factory installed in my GMC Acadia and GMC Yukon! Let me tell you- the picture quality on this one is far better than my factory installed one. Both night and day the picture is so crisp and bright with clear lines to mark your distance. I highly recommend this back up camera and I will be purchasing more for our 2 other vehicles that do not have back up cameras. And when my other 2 teens start driving- I will be buying these as well! And the customer service is seriously the best! So prompt on response and polite. Best buying experience ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than wireless.
customer_reviews.text: This camera works better than the wireless camera I had. The wireless camera had a delay also the picture would freeze so you couldn't trust it. This product took a little longer to install but works better, no lag. I installed on f150 extended cab and cable was long enough. I also like the camera angle on this product 149 degree is better than 170 degree. I tow a camper so I hooked this up so the camera is turned on with switch on 12v power outlet in truck, other cameras only work in reverse which doesn't work well when trying to hook up a trailer, you need camera on when you pull forward to realign. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Customer support
customer_reviews.text: We installed this onto my Mothers car as she is having more difficulty with backing up in her Senior years. We did have an issue with the cable that runs from the back of the vehicle to the dash. We contacted the seller and they provided us with a new one quickly and efficiently. We installed the new cable with no problems and mom loves it. The seller also sent the windshield suction cup with the new cable which really helps in placing it for best viewing. We are pleased with the picture in the bright sunlight and at night. It is better than we figured it would be for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Mikolashek

customer_reviews.title: So easy. So simple. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Alright I'll be honest. It's not like one that's built in to the car already. I had a little trouble mounting it so I could use my tailgate and still be able to see with the camera. But once I mounted it and seen the quality of the whole thing I wish I'd done this years ago. It's awesome. Making it easier to hook up trailers and backing into parking spots. Night and day difference. I will say even if you get it and use it make sure you use your mirrors to make sure nothing is out of it's range of sight. So you don't run into anything else...
customer_reviews.author: brandon l.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: We recently were on vacation and our rental car had a backup camera. My Husband loved it. So for Christmas I got him this one. Only problem we had with the installation was the rain that started every time we went out to put it in. The actual installation was very easy and the camera works great. My Husband laughs every time he uses it and says, "I love it." It was his favorite Christmas gift. image from camera was great too. Definite recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera and monitor. At the low price, it was much better than I expected. I also appreciated the follow-up email from the company to check that the product was working properly. Hooking up the unit was very easy. The only improvement that I could suggest is that it would contain an additional cable with a length of 3 to 6 feet. Since I mounted the camera on my dashboard for a front view, I am left with a great amount of extra cable that I need to hide some place.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was an inexpensive way to get a backup camera on my jeep. I use the jeep to pull a pop up camper and I placed this camera on my bumper in front of the ball. I can see to hitch better and still see the lines to park. The install was fairly easy (it is a jeep you know) and I had plenty of wire to work with. I got way more than I expected! If it only lasts a year, it will be well worth it. I chose to install using an unused cigarette lighter instead of tapping into my backup lights.
customer_reviews.author: knighthawke2k

customer_reviews.title: Complete fail - see update.
customer_reviews.text: Took less than a week for the magnetic mounting plate to fall off. Update: I epoxied the mounting plate back on. Now camera doesn’t work at all. If you enjoy shelling out $$, and spending your time installing this system, to have it only work for a week, knock yourself out. Update: contacted the seller via the amazon add phone number listed. They sent a new one, works great. I have to return the broken one.
customer_reviews.author: Dangrenade

customer_reviews.title: Good unit.  Easy installation.  Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid system for what you are pay for. The installation was easy and it works as it should. LeeKooLuu customer service is excellent. I had questions before purchase and questions after purchase. All emails were responded to within hours. The only gripe about this system, if I were to have one, would be that there is only one camera input on monitor. It would have been cool to hook up a forward camera. No big deal. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read your instructions.. there’s something special there.
customer_reviews.text: Product was super easy to install, you can install either with cigarette lighter outlet or tap into your reverse light so it only powers when in reverse. I did the latter. Quality of kit is amazing compared to others I have used comes with splicers and everything and more that you need to complete the job. Image quality could be better but still works way better then no camera at all. Overall great buy for the money. P.s. READ THE INSTRUCTIONS....HINT HINT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect view angle with great image
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how good of a value this camera monitor combination was. Wasn’t too hard to install and I like the 3M self adhesive tape on the monitor base. The camera sits on the license plate of min was surprised at how good of a value this camera monitor combination was. Wasn’t too hard to install and I like the 3M self adhesive tape on the monitor base. The camera sits on the license plate of my 2015 Hyundai Elantra & shows rear & sides around me perfectly. No more scraping my rims on curbs
customer_reviews.author: Nate Fryer

customer_reviews.title: I can see behind me now!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a need for a long time. The Saturn Vue I occasionally drive has a small back window and it's high. This camera filled the need perfectly. The hardest part of the installation is getting the cable from the outside to the inside of the car. Once that was done the rest fell into place. The connectors supplied work well. Ample cable. I have to hide a bunch but that's no problem. Minimal adjustment after turning it on for the first time. This will be very nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Cheap is as cheap does.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good camera. It has great reviews and seemed like a inexpensive solution to not having eyes in the back of my head. I don’t need anything outrageous I said. Well you get what you pay for. I hooked my first one up, no issues there, it was super easy. It came on and worked fine the first couple hours. I’m now on my second one and after a week the picture doesn’t even come on. If you just need it for an hour this is the camera for you. Anything after that and you’re waisting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Porter

customer_reviews.title: Minimal/No Night Vision
customer_reviews.text: I liked most everything about this unit except at night. I can see almost nothing at night. The Amazon description says,"...crystal clear color both at night and day". I have not checked if my LEDs are defective or if they just don't put out enough light for the camera to do the job. I sure wish it would have worked as advertised. I'll be keeping it as I don't do much night driving and have already invested the time to install. Daytime image is great and clear.
customer_reviews.author: CHank

customer_reviews.title: Nice back up camera
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality. Installation was relatively easy, but I do have an electronics background. Instead of the splices I soldered the power lines in from the back up lights. I’ve only had it installed for a couple of days so the rating is subjective at this point, but seems to be well made. The suction cup for the mount wouldn’t stay stuck, but when I contacted the seller they said they’d mail me a new one out ASAP. So customer service seems good.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I've been looking for in a Back up Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large F350 with a gooseneck ball. My truck predates the factory backup camera. I need one to see the hitch and the gooseneck ball. This system allows me to have it on a switch or wired into the reverse lights. So easy its jst plug and play wires from the camera to the monitor. When I have it all installed I will upload pictures. My truck is super long and this company offers a longer cable which is what I've been waiting for. I have already told all my friends at work and they are ready to see it in action.
customer_reviews.author: 007 BOND

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This camera was an answer to my backing into things problem. I have a Ford F-150 long bed and is was so hard to see what was behind me when backing up. This camera solved my problem. Installation wasn't too difficult (just the laying on my back under the truck running the wire), using zip ties made the project much easier. I really like the quality picture and the price was great. I certainly would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW!!! You will not find a better deal
customer_reviews.text: This rear view camera system is incredible! The install was very straight forward and incredibly simple to do. The quality of the monitor and camera are great! And the options of adding a 2nd camera make this even better. I chose to install mine as a continuous feed instead of wiring it into the reverse lights, and I love it! The price is unbelievable too. I would expect something like this to cost more than $100. I will be purchasing one of these for each car I own that doesn’t have a reverse camera!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: check voltage before connect to reverse power line
customer_reviews.text: defect product? After 3hrs installation, this is what I got. Update: the problem was caused my the low voltage of the reverse light power line. it only supplys 11.3V and I got the shaking video. I have to use one of the individual power outlet, about 14V, then no issue. my advice is check the voltage if you want to connect to the reverse power line. Also, a second camera was sent to me before I figured out the issue. it is really helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for an item that is in a different owned location. We travel there infrequently. Went to hook it up and seems to have a bad wire to the screen or screen bad. flickering and when play with wire you can see it is wire to screen. Since our travel and return from location leaves us outside the return window i have a 40.00 piece of paperweight. Do yourself a favor and spend the money on a different unit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Best camera you can buy for 30 bucks. - Good quality including night mode. - Installation wasn't easy the first time, but now it is a breeze after buying a second camera. - The 12V adapter will make you life much easier. Cons: - The wiring is visible and is not very appealing. I had to use tapes to mount and adhere the wires to the car chassis. - Screen doesn't have different camera viewing modes to choose from (i.e. wide, narrow).
customer_reviews.author: GGSM Mobile

customer_reviews.title: Description is deceiving. - Updated
customer_reviews.text: The camera is black and white not color like in the description and the guidelines don’t adjust or turn off. If you want these features, don’t purchase this. The description is deceiving. Updated: I bumped this review up to 5 stars from 2. Maybe I received one with a defect, the screen is black and white but once I put the car in drive in turns to color, then stays color if I go back to reverse. The guidelines still don’t seem to be adjustable, but all in all it does assist with reversing in tight spots, just don’t rely totally on the guidelines.
customer_reviews.author: Wa_chin_u

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: First off I feel it is a very good value for the money. You do get what you pay for, but I feel with this you get a little more than you pay for. Instructions are a little tough to decipher, but with a little automotive know how it is not a difficult install. I installed this on my 2012 Volt in about 4 hours, taking my time when running the cables to the front of the car to make sure they were nice and hidden.
customer_reviews.author: B. Snell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, but I'll make it work. (update)
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from my picture, the image is somehow shifted. The camera is dead center. The right side lines up but the white line on the left side is lined up with the ACTUAL side of my car. Also, the parking lines have 4 presets. No left/right adjustment. Not fully adjustable like the description suggests. (Update) Seller contacted me about my issue with the shifted image and sent me a new camera that will shift the parking lines. I'll add another update once I have it installed.
customer_reviews.author: Vanguard

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good camera system for the price. I didn't plug it into my reverse lights so the nught lights stay on at night (which is illegal in my state). But even with the lights blacked out, its pretty good video. It comes with 2 display options: dash mounted or window mount. My advice is that whichever you chose, make sure to tighten the knob that connects to the camera. Otherwise the camera will keep falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A great safety addition to an older car
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing to get a high quality backup camera for such a low price. The picture is clear and well lit. The installation is easy enough. The hardest part is snaking the wire from the licence plate in the rear up to the dashboard. The directions are clear and adjustments are easy to make using the buttons on the back of the monitor. I saved myself about $200 from what I was about to pay for a domestic name brand camera.
customer_reviews.author: Daystar

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the polarity of power wires is correct
customer_reviews.text: Its important to get the polarity rtight going to the backup jights. If at first it doesn't work check the (+) and (-) to be sure they are wired cottectly to the backup light wires, At firsy I got them backwards and it didn't work. Than I checked them with a meter and the black wire was (+) not (-). The other wire was white which is normally (+) Turned it on and it worked right away
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera and monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was a little weary of the quality for the price but once I go it installed (very easy by the way) I was thoroughly impressed. It was installed on a 2006 Chevy Silverado Extended Cab and had plenty of wire. I use it for lining up my camper hitch and he picture quality is crystal clear. I do not have a single complaint. I highly recommend this backup camera due to the quality and ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.O.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Useless. Worthless
customer_reviews.text: stay away from this. garbage. looks like a scam to me. by the time i got around to installing, my "return window" had closed. the wiring instructions included are a total mess. completely indecipherable. spoke to the seller. they directed me to a website to help with the wiring. website in chinese. absolutely no way for me to find an "instructional video". i do not read chinese. i wired as best i could and the system did not work. avoid this. save yourself money and headache.
customer_reviews.author: Iohann

customer_reviews.title: Flickering screen
customer_reviews.text: I like the option of turning on when I want to , using the cigarette lighter as the power source. The installation went well. There is just one problem and has to do with the display. It flickers intermittently like it fades in and out and I find it somewhat annoying. I installed this in my van outside the return window so I am stuck with it. Nevertheless it still functions
customer_reviews.author: Sounds

customer_reviews.title: One great product, 5 stars !
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the quality of this camera. The picture is fantastic. HD 1080p , very easy to install. 2 ways to power it up. They supply a 12volt switch that plugs into any lighter or 12volt power supply or it can be hard wired into your reverse light and will come on when vehicle is put in R.. They thought of every mounting option for the monitor. This is one great back up camera. Definitely 5 stars. Jeff Palm Harbor, FL
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: DOA Check other reviews
customer_reviews.text: This happened to be the 3rd or 4th device I've purchased in the last couple weeks from amazon which was DOA. Starting to get sick of all the low quality assured imported tech devices. This worked well for the first day or two and then continually froze after driving for about 5-10 minutes and wouldn't shut off. I had to let it die every time before attempting to use it again. I was told to try different memory and update the firmware. I tried both and neither fixed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: We've had this camera up and running for a few days now and it has been great. We're still trying to dial in the color but the picture quality is really good. We installed it in the on/off configuration in a full size cargo van and backing up has not been easier. Installation was super easy too, the hardest part being where to hide the cable. Just a little strategic tucking here and there and voila - back up camera installed! The seller was quick to respond to comments and has been frienly and professional too.
customer_reviews.author: cmcadams

customer_reviews.title: good value !
customer_reviews.text: installed in 2006 Chrysler pacifica . to aid in backing up low utility trailer . installation is straightforward . routing wire around liftgate window , under upholstery side panel, then under carpet is a tedious job ,and longer wiring is available from supplier. standard wiring suited my application with about 14 inches to spare (whew!) display is rather small but clear . with a little practice I could back the trailer in the driveway. 40 dollars well spent
customer_reviews.author: brian j lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good low cost budget backup camera
customer_reviews.text: It took about 1 1/2 hours to install and route the cable on my Silverado pickup truck. Overall, I am happy with it. It does seem a bit on the low end of quality (lots of cheap plastic) but time will tell how it holds up. If it holds up well, I will be happy with it. The only other negative is that the display/monitor is on the small side. I would have liked the display to be at least 2 inches bigger for ease of use and better vision. Overall, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Camera stopped working in two months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in May and within two months, it stopped working. It began to act up shortly after purchase and telling me that there is no video output. Then, I saw water filled images, and now nothing but a blur. This is supposed to be waterproof and it IS NOT!! I feel scammed, and would like to return this. Not a good product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: flickering
customer_reviews.text: it works normal when the car is in acc mode and the shift lever is in reverse, once the car is started and then placed in reverse again the screen starts flickering to the point you can hardly make out what the camera is seeing i connected it like this.... rear reverse lamp positive 12v for the power a nice chassis ground for the negative no matter what the ground it continues to flicker.
customer_reviews.author: TheOperator

customer_reviews.title: Don't over think it.
customer_reviews.text: The newer wiring is different than any I've installed before. Not RCA like usuall, just power and signal on one end and smaller 4 pin round connectors to monitor. Was easier, less invasive, and cleaner final look once I figured it out. Will be using this kind again. Nice secure connections. ( I usually ended up taping RCA together just to be sure didn't pull loose.)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Took a little thinking to install it, but its in and working. Its only $38 but at least its good enough to see when backing up. I've had this for a year and a half and I couldn't be happier. Makes backing into parking spots safe and easy. And its safer backing up when little kids are in the neighborhood. And I can see really good backing up in the dark. I installed a wireless cam in my Camry. Wished I would have stayed with the LeeKooLuu. It has a better screen and works great in the dark. Recommended it to some friends and they are happy.
customer_reviews.author: tomfishhunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rear View camera
customer_reviews.text: This rear view camera is excellent. The picture is clear, it was very easy to install and the seller included a longer cable so it would work in our camper. We are very pleased with it. The screen size makes it easy to see and watch even while driving. This is a wonderful camera and the price is right. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a back up and/or rear view camera for their vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: KatMom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a superb price point
customer_reviews.text: A great fit for anyone looking to have a quality backup cam (or in my case, a rear-view cam for my truck). Install couldn't get any easier, and it comes with both the sticky-tape mount and the window-suction-cup mount in case you aren't sure where to park the display. 5 stars, even considering an additional camera for my front bumper (parking can be tricky in the city lol).
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived quickly and complete. Installation was easy. Installed in a large SUV and cable was more than enough to route under trim and carpet. I didn't want to hardwire so contacted seller and requested a cigarette lighter adapter which was sent promptly. No problems wiring or attaching monitor to dash. Camera angle was perfect for my application. Monitor/picture clear. Customer service is one of the best ever dealt with. Purchase with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Akuma Ryuu

customer_reviews.title: BACK VIEW from back bumper level, very useful
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I can see a clear view of my back surroundings, I just got my first brand new vehicle its also way bigger and longer vehicle than my old tiny car where I could fit anywhere. I was really worried about hitting anything, I also live in an apartment complex where everyone parks to close to eachother and I don't want to hit anything and this has definitely helped me A LOT. Thanks to my new camera kit I can watch behind me at all times its really neat being able to see how far a car is from behind whether its at a stop light or parallel parking, its pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this camera because I have a heavy duty trailer I pull behind my truck for my SXS. I was having a hard time lining the truck up to hook the trailer. Usually had to have a second person to guide me. That all changed when I bought this camera!!! It works excellent for my application. Helluva value for the price!! Very easy to install. The image quality is pretty good for the price. I have mine wired where I can view the trailer and load whenever I want. This helps for load security such as checking straps and such. Love it! Best money I’ve spent!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fiorillo

customer_reviews.title: I use a rocker switch to turn it off and on.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing this on my 2013 Ford F-150. I didn't want to wire it to my back up lights although that would have been the easiest way to do it, so I picked an always on hot circuit and used an LED rocker switch to turn it on and off. Also the easiest place to mount it would have been on the left of the dash but easy is no fun so I had to drill and cut quite a bit of the webbing behind the dash, but I think the location is more in my line of sight than off to the left. Anyway, an excellent camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Dubé

customer_reviews.title: Know the size of the wire you need for installation.
customer_reviews.text: I install this camera in my 04 dodge ram 3500 slt truck. I struggle with my rear light since is an old truck but found the right wire and from there all electrical adapters were easy to use. The seller provided with free 33 feet cable and windshield mount for free. This help tremendously. I like the the set up so far. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This camera is worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The camera works as described. I bought it for my Toyota Corolla 2013 which doesn't come with a built-in back up camera. It's relatively easy to install. The hardest part is to wire the power cable from the trunk through to the front of the car. The box comes with all the stuff that you need. During installation, I accidentally broke one of the power connectors. I contacted the seller and they were quick to send me a replacement. Highly recommended this product if you are in a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Luan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up to test the camera, worked fine. Installed the backup cam and ran all the wires under carpet in the car. Worked once after installation. By the time I got out into public and went to use it to back up it didnt work anymore. No signal error came on and then went black. Had to disconnect everything and send it back. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Great Picyure Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, The screen is just the right size and the camera is easy to connect to your back up tail light. The camera is adjustable and can be pointed at various angles to obtain a clear view of your hitch. There are various videos on YouTube that can address installation issues but the company is highly response to any questions you may have about installation and will email a wiring diagram upon request. This product is an inexpensive solution for vehicles without a factory installed camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B

customer_reviews.title: Great Back up camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on the reviews-I had my rear view mirror in my old RV fall off -and used this instead -easy to set up -long wires -no issues at all. And they customer service is superb. They had free gifts if you emailed them and asked them. Highly recommend not just for the superiority and ease of installation but also for the after sales support!
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item, good price and comes with everything you need for a professional install. The rear license plate camera cable is long enough for a full size cargo van. There is an on off button at the rear of the monitor which is a great option. I wired the camera to accessory power so it can see what’s behind me without having to use reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Abbatello

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter and son-in-law for Christmas. I installed one on a 2006 Nissan Altima and one on a 2008 Hyundai Sante Fe. Easy installation. We just plugged in the power source so that the camera's and monitors can be turned on any time they are needed. They work great so far! Would definitely recommend for the price.!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fine product at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Backup Camera and Monitor! Easy to install! I installed the system on my 2005 Dodge Caravan in about 1.5 hours that including hiding the wires in the rear hatch and through the inside of the van. I would recommend this to any who wants to see behind the VECHICLE before and during back up! It is a must have in my booK. Thanks LeeKooLuu for a fine product at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Masterscross

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a little tricky in my '08 Dodge Grand Caravan. The hatch cover needed to be removed and reinstalled. There was more than enough wire, thank you! The color on the monitor is good. The night LEDs work well. The green/yellow/red guidelines work well for distance, but are not adjustable to the width of the vehicle. The On light at the power switch is helpful. The adhesive didn't hold the monitor for more than 4 days. Customer service is friendly and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fraklin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was able to install it on his 04 F-150, only complain is that it takes a few seconds for the screen to show up when he's going to reverse. Otherwise it has great picture quality! Edit: Spoke to Customer service about the camera suddenly not working about 1 month or so after purchase. After trying everything, they sent me a replacement at no cost!!! It works great and the picture view is incredible for the price paid! Will definitely recommend to others. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nini
